summary: A simple spell that allows you too conjure a spectral warhound.
descriptionHtml:
The Spell Tome used to summon a spectral warhound can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun. Simply pickup the book and read it. 

[u]Stats(Spell):[/u]
[ul]No casting perk required
Range of 24 ft.
Duration of 120 seconds
Magicka cost of 230
0.5 Charge Time[/ul]

[u]Stats(Creature):[/u]
[ul]Speed of 115
Level 50
500 Health
0 Magicka
265 Stamina
Is essential
Doesn\'t effect stealth meter[/ul]

[u]Skill(Creature):[/u]
[ul]100 One-handed
15 Two-handed
100 Archery
100 Block
15 Smithing
15 Heavy armour
15 Light armour
15 Pickpocket
15 Lockpicking
100 Sneak
15 Alteration
15 Speech
15 illusion
15 Alteration
15 Conjuration
15 Enchanting 
15 Restoration
15 Destruction[/ul]

[u]AI Data:[/u]
[ul]Unaggressive
Happy
Foolhardy
Helps Friends and Allies
50 Energy[/ul]

I used this to create my mod so I figured I would give him a shout out. DarkFox127 has released many mods of his own and he has released many creation kit tutorials and videos spotlighting the progress of his mods. I suggest you check him out and support him.
[youtube]EvVz3KfDwp0[/youtube]
  

[b]FOOTNOTE:[/b] If even a single person would like a version were the spectral warhound is permanent, feel free to leave a comment or message me and I will be happy to create one for you.
author: The Mad Meister
